scripts.build: echo "BUILD SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && export PNPM_HOME="/workspace/.pnpm_home" && export PATH="$PNPM_HOME:$PATH" && echo "Installing pnpm v10.11.0 into $PNPM_HOME..." && npm install -g pnpm@10.11.0 --prefix="$PNPM_HOME" --no-save && echo "Verifying pnpm installation: $(which pnpm) - $(pnpm --version)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; fi && echo "Running pnpm install (frozen lockfile) from /workspace..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && echo "Running nx build test-app from /workspace..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store pnpm exec nx build test-app --configuration=production && echo "BUILD SCRIPT FINISHED."
scripts.start: echo "START SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && export PNPM_HOME="/workspace/.pnpm_home" && export PATH="$PNPM_HOME:$PATH" && echo "Verifying pnpm installation: $(which pnpm) - $(pnpm --version)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; fi && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store pnpm exec serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
